name: Froggophrenia
description:
Instructions: Stay Alive as long as possible

Controls:

LMB/RMB - Shoot Gun

Q/E - Lean Left/Right ()

Space - Tongue Steal Weapon (Not Working)

The Team:

- Cakeflurry: Programmer, Designer

- RTHiro: Art Assets

A super rush but fun effort in between college studies. Unfortunately did not managed to implement all features for the main gameplay loop... :( but still, proud of what we did in such a stressful short period!

Special thx to Debuking for lending a hand at a busy time
